code: import React from"react";import{Area,AreaChart,ResponsiveContainer}from"recharts";import Widget from"components/Widget/index";var data=[{name:'Page A',pv:200},{name:'Page B',pv:1000},{name:'Page C',pv:600},{name:'Page D',pv:1600},{name:'Page D',pv:1000},{name:'Page H',pv:2260},{name:'Page K',pv:400}];var IncreamentCard=function IncreamentCard(){return React.createElement(Widget,{styleName:"jr-card-full"},React.createElement("div",{className:"jr-actchart d-flex flex-row px-3 pt-3"},React.createElement("h2",{className:"mb-0 mr-2 jr-fs-lg"},"84% ",React.createElement("i",{className:"zmdi zmdi-caret-up jr-fs-xxl"})),React.createElement("p",{className:"mb-0 text-grey jr-fs-sm"},"Increment in Active users")),React.createElement(ResponsiveContainer,{className:"overflow-hidden card-img-bottom",width:"100%",height:52},React.createElement(AreaChart,{data:data,margin:{top:0,right:0,left:0,bottom:0}},React.createElement("defs",null,React.createElement("linearGradient",{id:"color4",x1:"0",y1:"0",x2:"1",y2:"0"},React.createElement("stop",{offset:"5%",stopColor:"#aa3c6d",stopOpacity:1}),React.createElement("stop",{offset:"95%",stopColor:"#ff9800",stopOpacity:1}))),React.createElement(Area,{dataKey:"pv",stackId:"2",strokeWidth:0,stroke:"#4D95F3",fill:"url(#color4)",fillOpacity:1}))));};export default IncreamentCard;
